title: Blood Rites
description: Helen Wells has achieved physical immortality but the artist in her demands jher moments of fame as well. After a series of successful exhibits,she retreats to the wilderness with her lover, Stephen Austra. But their peaceful existence is shattered by a sadistic killer from her past who tears her away from Stephen. With her life threatened, she must draw on powers she has barely learned to use in order to survive.
author: Elaine Bergstrom
